Note: Signed "Victor Pererd." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to the manufacturer, the dealer and the workman to consider the boys in battle before the manufacturer fixes the price and the dealer adds that extra profit and before the workman strikes. Illustration shows a man alone on the battlefield aiming his rifle.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : publisher not identified

Title: "Is this MY boy?"
